column3:
There's so many photo editing apps for Android and I dare to say that this 
is one of the best out there. This app leans towards serious editing 
compared to others. Beginners do not have to worry because there's a video 
tutorial in app to show how to use specific edit. There's of course ads so 
th...Full ReviewThere's so many photo editing apps for Android and I dare to say that this 
is one of the best out there. This app leans towards serious editing 
compared to others. Beginners do not have to worry because there's a video 
tutorial in app to show how to use specific edit. There's of course ads so 
that the developer can earn some income. I bought the VIP and it's really 
worth the price even if you don't edit frequently. To James, continue to 
optimize and add new features in the future update. Looking forward to it.

I don't know a single person who would agree with the terms of service one 
must accept in order to use this app. Logging my device ID, IP address, 
websites I visit etc. Then they want to share this information with 
companies and advertisers as they deem appropriate? I don't give a damn if 
the in...Full ReviewI don't know a single person who would agree with the terms of service one 
must accept in order to use this app. Logging my device ID, IP address, 
websites I visit etc. Then they want to share this information with 
companies and advertisers as they deem appropriate? I don't give a damn if 
the info you collect personally identifies me or not. This is no different 
than Facebook. They offer you a "service" but the reality is that it's all 
about turning the user into a commodity which they then can exploit for 
profit.

Pretty good app even the basic without upgrade is much better than a lot of 
the pro versions I've paid for. Great job folks! I seem to use the darn 
thing almost daily. Thanks again guy's. still Loving it..

This app is a full photo editor software (not just a couple of 
auto-filters). Impossible to describe with a few sentences - but if you are 
reading this to find out if this app can do this or that with your image, 
trust me, it most probably can. The auto mask in this app (Yeah, it has got 
THAT to...Full ReviewThis app is a full photo editor software (not just a couple of 
auto-filters). Impossible to describe with a few sentences - but if you are 
reading this to find out if this app can do this or that with your image, 
trust me, it most probably can. The auto mask in this app (Yeah, it has got 
THAT too!) is better than on Gimp... Enough said. Just try it for yourself. 
Ah, economy... Well, you will want to support the Dev, because it is a 
choice left to you. He asks for nothing but let us buy him a beverage if we 
insists. How fab is that!!

It's all good, except for one major issue: the "quit"/"accept changes" 
needs to be far less sensitive. I keep losing my work because I brush over 
these buttons using the tools.

I have tried a lot of pjoto editing apps and this is the one i always come 
back to. Some of the others can do a lot of flashy things that tool whiz 
can't HOWEVER, tool whiz has all of the necessities for making your pics 
work however and wherever you want them to.

Best photo editing app I've ever used! My only complaint would be the 
"reflect" tool. While I love that you can rotate the dual images freely, I 
really wish there were more buttons to auto turn the image so that I don't 
have to manually rotate the image, which never comes out even, rather than 
j...Full ReviewBest photo editing app I've ever used! My only complaint would be the 
"reflect" tool. While I love that you can rotate the dual images freely, I 
really wish there were more buttons to auto turn the image so that I don't 
have to manually rotate the image, which never comes out even, rather than 
just shape overlays (which, to be honest, are kinda lame). Aside from that, 
brilliant, just the best! I highly recommend this to anyone and everyone, 
professional and amateur alike!

Don't waste your time with other photo editing apps! This app is what you 
are looking for if you want to make high quality memes, fix a photo, you 
can even edit out people in your photos!

Absolutely the best editing app. I've tried others just to see what else is 
out there cause they have not done much changing or adding to this app for 
a couple of years and this app is by far the better app that I have found. 
What would be nice is to see some more changes or add ons. Also would b...Full ReviewAbsolutely the best editing app. I've tried others just to see what else is 
out there cause they have not done much changing or adding to this app for 
a couple of years and this app is by far the better app that I have found. 
What would be nice is to see some more changes or add ons. Also would be 
nice if the galley actually added the shortcut. Going to email them about 
it and find out why it's not doing it. The gallery they have is awesome 
cause you can flip through and edit all in one spot instead of opening the 
app up then select your picture but when you select and you picked the 
wrong picture you back up and have to start all over. Kinda sucks.

Like many other people, I've wasted countless hours downloading photo 
editing apps, testing them out, then uninstalling them. There must be 
thousands of photo editors on the Play Store. Of all that I've looked at, 
ToolWiz is the best. ToolWiz is powerful and I like the clean design of the 
app bu...Full ReviewLike many other people, I've wasted countless hours downloading photo 
editing apps, testing them out, then uninstalling them. There must be 
thousands of photo editors on the Play Store. Of all that I've looked at, 
ToolWiz is the best. ToolWiz is powerful and I like the clean design of the 
app but the lack of labels for some of the functions makes some features 
hard to find. It can be tough to figure out certain features. Your 
tutorials certainly help in this regard.

Good so far, but was looking for something I could use to edit scanned text 
documents (select area, copy or cut, paste and/or blend}, using layers; 
soft-copy notes, homework, etc. Also seeking editable Ken Burns effect 
production (Pan & Tilt). Not sure yet if that functionality is in there.

10/05/18 update: After a recent app update I can add text to a pic but 
cannot edit or enhance the text. The app keeps crashing. Have reported but 
got no response. Was such a great app, now not very good at all. And the 
developers seem not to give a damn. Shame.

I've tried many of the free photo apps.Before discovering Toolwiz , I would

them together to achieve the desired effects. They're all great apps, but...Full ReviewI've tried many of the free photo apps.Before discovering Toolwiz , I would 
mainly use Pixlr,Snapseed, Line camera, Wipeout & Erase,for everything from 
multiple exposures to adding filters & text, often having to use all of 
them together to achieve the desired effects. They're all great apps, but 
Toolwiz does the job of all of them, all in one app! Outstanding!

all of my other editing apps. My only suggestions are there should be a 
removal selection, where you can just select the area you want gone and 
pre...Full ReviewI absolutely love this app. It has so many options when editing, a ton of 
filters, stickers etc. Best yet for 90% of my editing, I've deleted almost 
all of my other editing apps. My only suggestions are there should be a 
removal selection, where you can just select the area you want gone and 
presto. Also when it comes to slimming the body, there should be a way to 
manually do it, so you can selwct where and how much you want done because 
the way it is now doesn't work very well, just kinda makes the whole 
picture look thinner, there isnt one which to me is very important. I would 
also love to be able to do a manual when is comes to red eye removal, don't 
really understand how this one works? When I try it leaves a black spot. I 
think there should be more options on lens flare and light leak or at least 
an option to upload more. But all in all it's an amazing app that I will 
always use and I've been telling everyone I know to download it!!

I hate it adjusting again and again. *Face tune - use only demabrasion or whitening in manual, I hate erasing all the background. Face detection of skin may help. *Makeup - I need to use makeup app in order to beautify your face. Having different hair, eyebrows, eye lens, lips, countour and etc.. *Blending and Layer - must have perspective positioning the image for example I want to replace the image in the billboard. *Different brushes - use to paint and add effects just like in photoshop.
